titleStmt.title: Four choice carols for Christmas holidays. Carol I. On Christmas-Day. Carol II. On St. Stephen's-Day. Carol III. On St. John's-Day. Carol IV. On Innocent's-Day. Being very necessary and proper to be had in all Christian families.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
In this edition the columns are divided by ruled lines.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
